name: Carl M. SMITH, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Smith v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Carl M. SMITH, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of November, 2004, the above captioned appeal is quashed as interlocutory pursuant to Rule 341, Pa.R.A.P.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
861 A.2d 262
Carl M. SMITH, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 3, 2004.
